== Bio ==
Dejan Vitlacil is Generic Area Coordinator of the Nordic
e-Infrastructure Collaboration (NeIC).

He holds position of System Manager at PDC Center for High Performance
Computing at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology.

His experience includes management, configuration and development, of
activities, storage and data infrastructures, at the institutional,
national and international level.
